statements: UPDATE patient_vital_signs SET blood_pressure='120/80', heart_rate=75, temperature=98.6 WHERE patient_id=101

UPDATE AlertLogs SET alert_description = 'High Heart Rate' WHERE alert_id = 101;

UPDATE vital_signs SET blood_pressure='120/80' WHERE patient_id=123;

UPDATE Patients SET age = 45, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE patient_id = 102;
